Namespace: Lime
Assembly: Lime.dll
Syntax
[TangerineNodeBuilder("BuildForTangerine")]
[TangerineAllowedChildrenTypes(new Type[]{typeof(ParticleModifier), typeof(EmitterShapePoint)})]
[TangerineVisualHintGroup("/All/Nodes/Particles", null)]
public class ParticleEmitter : Widget, IDisposable, IAnimationHost, IFolderItem, IFolderContext, IRenderChainBuilder, IAnimable, ITangerinePreviewAnimationListener, IUpdatableNode
